sentences.en: A galaxy of twinkling stars matched the thousands of sparkling city lights.
sentences.cn: 闪烁的繁星与城内闪耀的万家灯火交相辉映.

sentences.en: Astronomers have discovered a distant galaxy.
sentences.cn: 天文学家们发现了一个遥远的星系。

sentences.en: Each galaxy contains myriads of stars.
sentences.cn: 每一星系都有无数的恒星.

sentences.en: From this you can calculate the total mass in the Galaxy.
sentences.cn: 由此你可以算出银河系的总质量。

sentences.en: Galactic nebulas are masses of diffuse material within our galaxy.
sentences.cn: 银河星云是我们星系中的一团团弥散物.

sentences.en: He is one of a small galaxy of Dutch stars on German television.
sentences.cn: 出现在德国电视上的荷兰明星为数不多，他是其中一位。

sentences.en: Most galaxy associations are small and have a low density contrast.
sentences.cn: 大多数星系协是小的,密度反衬低.

sentences.en: Radio signals received from the galaxy's centre back up the black hole theory.
sentences.cn: 从该星系中心收到的无线电信号证实了黑洞理论。

sentences.en: The company has a galaxy of talent.
sentences.cn: 该公司拥有一批优秀的人才.

sentences.en: The earth is one of the planets in the Galaxy.
sentences.cn: 地球是银河系中的星球之一.

sentences.en: The Galaxy consists of 100 billion stars.
sentences.cn: 银河系由1,000亿颗恒星组成。

sentences.en: The main thrust of the research will be the study of the early Universe and galaxy formation.
sentences.cn: 此项研究的核心是早期宇宙和银河系的形成。

sentences.en: The starts were formed from gases that originally permeated the whole galaxy.
sentences.cn: 恒星是由原来遍及于整个星系内的气体所形成.

sentences.en: To understand galaxy formation we would like to think of gravitation.
sentences.cn: 为了理解星系的形成,我们总要想到万有引力.

sentences.en: Within our own galaxy there are probably tens of thousands of planetary systems.
sentences.cn: 在我们自己的星系里可能有数以万计的行星系。

words.tran_cn: 人才荟萃,一群显赫人物

phrases.tran_cn: 仙女座星系；仙女座星云
银河商务酒店；银河宾馆
n. 中国银河证券有限责任公司
n. 螺旋星云（等于spiral nebula）

trans.tran_cn: 星系，银河系，一群显赫的（出色的）人物
trans.tran_en: one of the large groups of stars that make up the universe
